title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text element is not displaying the contents of the db field correctly when it contains different types of content.
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the db field accurately. It does not render HTML text within <html> tags properly, HTML fragments not within <html> tags are not displayed correctly, and text with RTF tags is also not rendered correctly.
EB: The dynamic text element should accurately display all types of content in the db field. It should properly render HTML text within <html> tags, display HTML fragments correctly even if they are not within <html> tags, and correctly render text with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a db field with three types of content: 
   - HTML text within <html> tags
   - HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   - Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text element is not displaying the content accurately for each of the three types of content.
